text: Navdeep Singh may refer to: *Navdeep Singh (Ashok Chakra) (died 2011), Indian soldier who posthumously received the Ashok Chakra *Navdeep Singh (cricketer) (born 1974), Indian cricketer and umpire *Navdeep Singh (director) (born 1968), Indian director *Navdeep Singh (lawyer), Indian lawyer, reserve army officer, and author
title: Navdeep Singh
